text-teaser.headline: About us
text-teaser.text: SinnerSchrader is one of the leading digital agencies in Europe with a focus on the design and development of digital products and services. More than 500 employees work on the digital transformation for companies such as ADAC, Airbus, Audi, Bosh,  comdirect bank, Deutsche Bahn, Deutsche Bank, Telef√≥nica, Roche and VW. Since April 2017, SinnerSchrader is part of Accenture Interactive.
